mapper.select: SELECT tl_d_job_posting_seq.nextval FROM Dual
SELECT * FROM TL_D_JOB_FIELD_CATEGORY tdjfc ORDER BY tdjfc.JOB_FIELD_CATEGORY_PK ASC
SELECT tdc.COM_PK FROM TL_D_COMPANY tdc WHERE tdc.BUSINESS_NUMBER LIKE #{BUSINESS_NUMBER}
SELECT * FROM TL_D_COMPANY
SELECT count(*) FROM tl_d_job_posting tdjp

SELECT * FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE 1 = 1
AND tdjp.POSTING_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%'
AND tdjp.JOB_POSITION LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND tdjp.POSTING_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
ORDER BY tdjp.CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT * FROM TL_D_COMPANY tdc WHERE tdc.COM_PK = #{com_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_D_JOB_FIELD_CATEGORY tdjfc WHERE tdjfc.JOB_FIELD_CATEGORY_PK = #{job_field_category_pk}
SELECT tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE BETWEEN (SYSDATE) AND (SYSDATE + (72/24))

SELECT tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp
WHERE tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE <= (SYSDATE)
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE tdjp.COM_PK = #{com_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK = #{job_posting_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_D_COMPANY_MANAGER tdcm WHERE tdcm.COM_MANAGER_PK = #{com_manager_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_D_COM_SCALE_CATEGORY tdcsc WHERE tdcsc.COM_SCALE_CATEGORY_PK = #{com_scale_category_pk}
SELECT CEIL((tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE - SYSDATE)) FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE 1 = 1 AND tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE BETWEEN (SYSDATE) AND (SYSDATE + (72/24)) AND tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK = #{job_posting_pk}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK = #{job_posting_pk}
mapper.update: UPDATE TL_D_JOB_POSTING SET STAFF_PK = #{staff_pk}, JOB_FIELD_CATEGORY_PK = #{job_field_category_pk}, POSTING_NAME = #{posting_name}, JOB_POSITION = #{job_position}, POSTING_MAINIMAGE = #{posting_mainimage}, POSTING_CONTENTS = #{posting_contents}, PREFERENCE = #{preference}, HIRE_NUMBER = #{hire_number}, POSTING_DEADLINE = #{posting_deadline}, CREATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE job_posting_pk = #{job_posting_pk}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tdjp.* FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK IN ( SELECT JOB_POSTING_PK FROM TL_D_INTEREST_POSTING WHERE student_pk = #{student_pk} ) ORDER BY POSTING_DEADLINE ASC )
WHERE rownum <= 4

SELECT tdjp.* FROM TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp WHERE tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK IN ( SELECT tdip.JOB_POSTING_PK FROM TL_D_INTEREST_POSTING tdip WHERE tdip.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} ) ORDER BY tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_D_INTEREST_POSTING tdip WHERE tdip.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk}
SELECT tdic.COM_PK FROM TL_D_INTEREST_COMPANY tdic WHERE tdic.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk}
SELECT tdc.* FROM TL_D_COMPANY tdc WHERE tdc.COM_MANAGER_PK IN ( SELECT tdcm.COM_MANAGER_PK FROM TL_D_COMPANY_MANAGER tdcm WHERE tdcm.EXTERNAL_PK = #{external_pk} )
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_D_INTEREST_POSTING WHERE job_posting_pk = #{job_posting_pk}
SELECT tjsi.* FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi WHERE tjsi.STUDENT_PK IN ( SELECT STUDENT_PK FROM TL_D_INTEREST_POSTING WHERE job_posting_pk = #{job_posting_pk} )
SELECT STUDENT_PK FROM TL_JIC_GRADUATION_INFO

SELECT * FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi WHERE tjsi.STUDENT_PK IN ( SELECT tdr.STUDENT_PK FROM TL_D_RESUME tdr WHERE tdr.RESUME_PK IN ( SELECT resume_pk FROM TL_D_VOLUNTEER u WHERE u.job_posting_pk = #{job_posting_pk} ) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tjsi.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE ASC) AS rnum FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi JOIN TL_D_RESUME tdr ON tjsi.STUDENT_PK = tdr.STUDENT_PK JOIN TL_D_VOLUNTEER tdv ON tdr.RESUME_PK = tdv.RESUME_PK JOIN TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp ON tdv.JOB_POSTING_PK = tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK JOIN TL_D_COMPANY tdc ON tdjp.COM_PK = tdc.COM_PK WHERE tdc.COM_PK = #{com_pk} )
WHERE rnum <= 4

SELECT tjsi.* FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi JOIN TL_D_RESUME tdr ON tjsi.STUDENT_PK = tdr.STUDENT_PK JOIN TL_D_VOLUNTEER tdv ON tdr.RESUME_PK = tdv.RESUME_PK JOIN TL_D_JOB_POSTING tdjp ON tdv.JOB_POSTING_PK = tdjp.JOB_POSTING_PK JOIN TL_D_COMPANY tdc ON tdjp.COM_PK = tdc.COM_PK WHERE tdc.COM_PK = #{com_pk} ORDER BY tdjp.POSTING_DEADLINE ASC
SELECT tjdc.name FROM TL_JIC_DEPARTMENT_CATEGORY tjdc WHERE tjdc.DEPARTMENT_PK = #{department_pk}

SELECT tdv.JOB_POSTING_PK FROM TL_D_VOLUNTEER tdv WHERE tdv.RESUME_PK IN ( SELECT tdr.RESUME_PK FROM TL_D_RESUME tdr WHERE tdr.STUDENT_PK IN ( SELECT tjsi.STUDENT_PK FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi WHERE tjsi.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} ) )
